root.name: Asphalt 5
root.description: OverviewAsphalt 5 is a street racing game in the sense of traditional arcade racing games. The phones built in accelerometer is utilized, allowing the player to carefully control their vehicle's movement.There are over 30 licensed cars and motorbikes included and 12 different racing locations. Eight separate racing events ranging from drift contest to chase mode are included as well as varied track surfaces including ice, mud and snow.Game options include solo play, head to head racing over WiFi or Bluetooth, or online through Gameloft's Live account.Car ListAudi R8Audi TT-RSAudi Q7Lamborghini Gallardo LP 560-4Lamborghini Murciélago LP 670-4 SVLamborghini ReventónFerrari 599 XXFerrari CaliforniaFerrari F430 16MFerrari FXX EvolutionNissan 370ZNissan GT-R R35Bugatti Veyron 16.4BMW X6MCaterham CSR SuperlightChevrolet Corvette ZR1 (2009)Chevrolet Camaro SS (2010_Ducati 1198Ducati Monster 1100sFord GTFord Shelby GT500Gumpert ApolloKawasaki Z750Kawasaki ZX6-RLotus 2-ElevenLotus EvoraMercedes E ClassMercedes ML 63 AMGMercedes-Benz S65 Black SeriesMINI Cooper SRUF 3400 KRUF DakaraRUF Rt 12
